alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:22PM EDT until June 25 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FULTON...KOSCIUSKO AND SOUTHEASTERN MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 321 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rochester, moving east at 30 mph. A 62 mph gust report was received near Rochester. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Rochester, Winona Lake, Mentone, Walnut, Tippecanoe, Silver Lake, Etna Green, Leesburg, Claypool, Burket, Sidney, Monoquet, Hoffman Lake, Atwood, Beaver Dam Lake, Old Tip Town, Sevastopol, Tiosa and Beaver Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for north central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
